entries.femaleVariant: Nuh-uh, that was not part of our deal, Reed.
This your partner? Fuck me…
Now hold up a second. I know you…
Hold up, hold up – you're that merc was runnin' with Panam.
Really gonna pretend you're innocent?
What's the plan?
Hrg. Modern-day patriotism for ya…
Ready to plan, strategize? Got everything we need?
'Bout time we went over the plan.
I flicked through your intel. Convoy route, vehicle array, weaponry they're likely to have.
You still care about her.
Clear to see… you care about her, still.
[Wait]
All right, jammer's calibrated. Do you know what to do?
Jumpin' MaxTac now, are we? Steppin' up your game.
What's your take on all this?
The famed JS got a hot take on all this?
Well, then. I just hope the FIA'll send us new contact detes once you're busy pushin' up daisies.
Got everything we can count on having.
On goin' toe-to-toe with MaxTac? Hell yeah – "good fuckin' luck." 'Cause you're gonna fuckin' need it.
They'll come down this road. Once in range, we hit 'em hard, bring 'em to a stop.
This is our jammer. I just need to calibrate it so the signal isn't too strong, otherwise So Mi could…
You say that every time, Gunner. Yet nobody's ever found out. And no one ever will.
They get wind it was us, might as well start diggin' our own fuckin' graves.
Mh. Here's the low-down. Convoy'll roll in from the northwest.
You wanna know the truth? Fine.
Need to do a better job vettin' your partners, Reed.
Seen how you handle your iron.
Heard a thing or two about you. More good than bad. You're sure to come in handy.
Chill, guy. Neither the time nor the place.
We'll manage.
Oh, please – gonna fuckin' pretend you're innocent?
Handle ourselves fine, don't you worry.
That's enough.
Enough of that.
Cool it, guy.  Can settle our beef later. This ain't the time or place.
entries.maleVariant: Cool it, guy.  Can settle our beef later. This ain't the time or the place.

entries.femaleVariant: Look, if shit goes sideways and Washington pins it on us, then--
Tsk, tsk, tsk, tsk, uh-uh. Careful. If I were you, I wouldn't finish that thought...
Outta the frying pan, into the fire, huh? Wherever trouble goes, you follow.
Cause it seems you're now runnin' with a murderin' piece of human trash.
Cept there's a difference between target practice an' MaxTac.
Stick around, help us out.
Now for a dozen more like you to stand any chance of survivin'…
But if you do survive this cat orgy of an op, remember – you'n me're square now.
Fine friends you've got.
Gangoons loyal to the starts and stripes, the irony…
6th Street? Here? At your beck and call?
Gangoons loyal to a country they're just not part of.
All good, Reed?
Everything all right, Reed?
Wanna talk? 'Bout the stadium, what happened? 'Bout Alex…?
Here? Now? No, V, we got work to do.
Didn't know you'd signed on to some suicide pact.
The best chance we have of stoppin' 'em's here. Traffic – minimal. Vantage points – optimal.
Yeah, what? Why?
Reed...
I just hope we're not too late…
Today, or seven years ago – dunno at what exact point I fucked up. The end result's that now we're here while she... she could die.
I just pray that she's… she's the one we're saving – the So Mi I knew and not some…
That'll be all, Johnny.
Meant Reed and Songbird.
Heh. What's there to say? Chick bought a one-way ticket to cyber-hell, floored the CHOOH and cut the brakes.
And she's draggin' us along.
Can say that again.
Bustin' into Arasaka Tower it ain't, but... it's up there. Somewhere. Tryin' to knock me off the arch-terrorist pedestal?
'Kay, Johnny, think that'll be all.
You're in a mood. Clearly spendin' too much time with Reed.
You, your boys – not gonna stick around, help us out?
The NUSA's fifth column in NC. We toss 'em equipment, a little cash here and there. Nothing unusual.
In return for doin' your dirty work, I'm guessin'.
You are guessin', but we got biz to discuss, don't we?
The fight to annex Night City, make it NC, NUSA, rages on…
We're not affiliated officially. On the sly, at times, we let 'em do us favors, make 'em feel important.
NUSA's useful idiots?
They're loyal. The rest doesn't concern me at all.
Now, you mind if we get down to biz?
Not a snowball's chance in hell. Got somethin' might even your shitty odds, though.
Lend 'em the drone – one that was to go to them Heywood clowns. On the house, folks. Consider it a… parting gift.
Anyone oughta be worried around here, it's you.
[Wait]
Need to do a better job vettin' your partners, Reed.
'Cause it seems you're now runnin' with a murderin' piece of human trash.
Well then, I just hope the FIA sends us new contact detes once you're busy pushin' up daisies.
But if you do survive this cat orgy of an op, remember – you'n me're square now.
Mhm. Gonna set up, then, and make tracks. As for you two, well… good fuckin' luck.
You folks do the prep, set up the baddest-ass trap you can.
Detes – walk me through 'em?
Detes, my man. Walk me through 'em.
How would we use 'em?

News flash – there's no such thing as perfect solutions, always some trade-off. We can paralyze them, ease your way into their ranks, but it'll cost you in the reduced effectiveness of Reed's covering fire.
Let's use the grenades. It'll mess with their optics, give us an edge.
Pass on the 'nades. Reed'll need good visibility.
What the hell, let's try usin' 'em. Should be surprisin'. Even if they're quick to regroup, it'll buy us time.
Eh, lose the 'nades. Gonna be mayhem anyway.
entries.maleVariant: Lose the 'nades. Gonna be mayhem anyway.

entries.femaleVariant: Turrets – where would you put 'em?
Way I see it, got two possibilities.
Let's line up the turrets.
Better spread the turrets around the site.
Where'd it be good to plant mines?
Stairs and hotel entrance – mines go there.
Plant mines at the stair and hotel entrances. I'll try takin' 'em out from there.
Mine the road. Be lookin' to get in close, fast as I can.
Copy that.
Ask and you shall receive.
A gamble, but it could pay off. Like my old man used to say, "Life's a losin' game, but you go all in anyway."
Mhm. Limiting variables – smart. Reduces how many things can go wrong. Against MaxTac, that could just do the trick.
Depends on your chosen tactic.
Plan's shapin' up real nice. Just need a word with Reed now.
OK, movin' to my position. G'luck, Reed.
To grab Song, we need to take out the convoy's security detail – three, maybe four operators and support.
I need you to understand one thing – they aren't cops or soldiers. More like AI-guided, stone-cold killers – each equal to a small army. Silver lining is they can't call for reinforcements.
Take my position, await the convoy. Go in hot when I see the charges pop.
We grab Song and head for the exfil point on the border. Clean, quick, no slip ups, no trip-ups. And one eye on Song the whole time, got it?
We won't need luck.
Sure. What're my options?
Mhm. Just gotta jam MaxTac's frequencies. Get ready.
That thing jammin' his pangs of conscience, too? Oughta get myself one…
Terrace is a solid choice. Preem visibility, in pissin' range of the convoy.
The stairs. You'll have the ambush laid out in front of you – means opportunities for layin' down strategic fire.
Third approach is riskier – by the skybridge. Can close the gap from there in no time.
But there are possibilities aplenty.
[Wait]
Too late for what?
Too late for what?
Reed?
Let's focus on the task at hand.
Hey, talk to me!
OK… task at hand, sure, let's focus.
Dammit, whadda I gotta do to get you talk to me?
Fine, say fuck-all for all I care.
You can't control everything.
We're saving her, no doubt.
Dunno that she can be saved.
Let's finish this.
I get it, Reed. But you can't have everything under control, not always.
Maybe you're right, maybe you're not. Won't know until we finish this.
I'm fucking scared, V. Scared my grip on everything is slippin'. There – happy?
Maybe so.
But it's good you're here, it matters. It'll all work out, we just have to finish this.
Best get to it, then.
If anyone's lost control in this sitch, it's her, not you. But it's still So Mi. She's there to save, truly. And I believe we will.
It's an either-or situation, V.
Honestly? No idea who we're bustin' outta that convoy, but there's a chance it won't be… that she's not, well…
I know. That's what scares me.
We need to finish this…
So let's hop to it.
Made up your mind?
Don't got a lot of time to whittle away.
Well, we good to move on?
We are talkin'.
Yeah, see that. Spill it, c'mon.
Do you have any questions about MaxTac? Now's the time.
Fuck me. Dodgin' always your go-to when the talk gets tough?
I'm focused on the op, that's it.
Focused, right. That's what it is.
V…
Spare both of us the bullshit.
Either we got it right… could very well be that. Or she's been playin' us for fools from the start.
Whaddaya mean?
Not now, Johnny.
Don't got time for this now, Johnny.
What're you on about now?
Chick's a half braindead, half AI-controlled zombie. Yet still the gonk's convinced his old partner's trapped inside. That only he can save her.
Hoppin' off the hope train, are ya?
Could be he thinks it's his fault.
What would the big J do? Abandon hope?
Maybe he's scared this might all be his fault.
Knew guys like him in the army. Gonks who thought they were born to hold people's lives in their hands.
Shit never ended well. Always with a lose-lose.
Know what bein' in the army taught me? Hope dies last 'cause the backstabbin' bitch makes damn sure she gets you killed first so you'll warm the fuckin' grave for her.
Saw many thousand-yard stares – willpower gone, hope hovering for no reason... Wanna bet on miracles? Go ahead. I'll pass.
Your choom, Reed, also requested some badass toys. Offensive turrets, mines, smoke grenades. Latter – not an issue, but the mines and turrets…
Wanna weigh in, sift through the detes, or leave prep to me? It's your call.
Let's line 'em up. Extra coverin' fire'll come in handy.
Let's set 'em up around the ambush site.
All right – two items of biz to nail down. One's your strategy, second's the kit we need to set you up with.
Turrets, I say – need me some more firepower.
Wanna talk strategy. What're our options?
Got about as many as there are frilly tea rooms in Dogtown – so not a whole lot. Do best to figure out the position you'll be ambushing 'em from. Then decide if smoke 'nades favor you there.
Mines're the thing – let's control the battlefield.
Gear – what's on the tasting menu?
Reed wants both mines and turrets. Well, I want a divorce without sayin' goodbye to a single enny. Can have a cake, but only to stare at it till it goes bad…
[End planning] Fine, good positions, all. I'll pick one, set up.
Run through the options again?
In a nutshell – terrace is a safe, secure position, stairs give you preem visibility, skybridge lets you get up close and personal real quick.
Right, clear. Good positions, all. I'll pick one, perch there, set up.
We can leave 'em some party favors at the skybridge's ends and at the hotel door. Prevent the motherfuckers from takin' high ground. Makes most sense if you'll be firing from there.
Then again, if you'd rather go street-level, get in close, we can pepper the mines over the road surface.
So whaddaya say? We minin' the road or the way up to the terrace?
Road needs minin'.
Could line 'em up along one side, pile on the pressure, draw attention – good suppressing fire, too. But they're psychos, not gonks, they'll wisen up and go around 'em eventually.
Option two – place the turrets around the site. Max bastards'll get nailed in the crossfire. It's sure to slow 'em down.
Your choice – suppressing fire from one side, or lead-poundin' from different angles to slow 'em down.
You got it.
This thing's gonna play out how you shape it. Grenades'll breed chaos, confuse them. They'll also obscure your view if you're firin' from a distance.
What about Reed an' me? Won't it reduce visibility for us?
Decision's yours. We doin' 'nades or not?
Yeah, cookin' with gas now.
Our friend here knows specifics, he'll fill you in. I got one last thing I need to take care of.
[Take shard] Let's do it.
I'm all set. You?
Right on. When fixin' to go out guns blazin', best be on your own terms.
Hell, I'd be shittin' bricks too, goin' up against MaxTac…
It's not gonna be easy. The reason they're called "Psychosquad's" two-fold. They're almost cyberpsychos themselves.
We then neutralize all MaxTac operatives, grab Songbird, run 'er to an exfil point just across the SoCal border.
Sitch is simple.
Short notice, folks. Can hook you up with one or the other, not both. Turrets for firepower, mines for crippling mobility. Your call, boss.
We set 'nades off on the road, for a time the assholes'll be aimin' and shootin' blind, hopefully each other.
You just talk to her?
Huh?
Body language. I could tell you enabled the Relic.
So was it her? Did you grab hold of Song?
Got no contact with Songbird.
Side effect… Relic's complicated.
Nah, just zoned out.
Nah, still no contact with So Mi… Been radio silence since all that shit went down at the stadium…
entries.maleVariant: Uh, nah, still no contact with So Mi… Been radio silence since all that shit went down at the stadium…

entries.femaleVariant: No, just a… side effect of the Relic. Your chooms at Langley'll have their work cut out for 'em.
entries.maleVariant: Uh, no, just a… side effect of the Relic. Your chooms at Langley'll have their work cut out for 'em.

entries.femaleVariant: Nah, just, uhm... zoned out for a flash. Lots to think about.
Right, understood.
Listen, your gear – you know it best. Leavin' the prep to you.
Damn, quite the demonstration of trust. I'm flattered, no - moved. Heh, OK, we'll do our thing.
Let's give it a whirl.
Preem, 'preciate the help. Gonna have a word with Reed.
Ready on my end. You?
Slot the shard. Once the drone's airborne, I'll explain the whats, hows and whys.
[Take shard] Let's see if Reed was right to trust you.
All righty, then. Let's see if you're as useful as Reed claims.
Your "patriots" came through. And I'm ready.
What's it you said? "Modern-day patriotism?" 'Cause you gotta admit, they came through.
Anyhow, think I'm all set. You? Ready for this?
Almost.
Plan – let's hear it..
Take it you're here to help?
All right, let's hear what you cooked up.
entries.maleVariant: All right, let's hear what you've cooked up.

entries.femaleVariant: Take it you're here to help?
Movin' on. Your startin' positions for when the shit hits the fan – care for a gander?
Sure. Lemme hear it.
[End planning] Nah, I'm good.
Nah, know all I need to know, thanks.
We'll cut off any chance of retreat, set off some planted charges, stop 'em dead in their tracks. Second Reed pops the Behemoth driver, you'll dive in.
Likely run right into the booby-trapped cars we'll set up. This could decomish a few vehicles, force the rest to switch lanes.
